alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 10 at 10:57PM MST until November 11 at 8:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...West Slopes and East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A low cloud deck remains anchored over the slopes of the Sacs resulting in the extension of the advisory. The fog should start dissipating in the morning hours.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
